title: S16 Ep9: Holzer's Ghosts - A Grave Revenge: The Haunting of The Whaley House
itunes:title: Holzer's Ghosts - A Grave Revenge: The Haunting of The Whaley House
description:
Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts - A Grave Revenge: The Haunting of The Whaley House with guest Alexandra Holzer.

Dave is joined by Alexandra Holzer to discuss a look back at one of the most fascinating cases Hans Holzer ever examined and a case that was literally a BIG HIT to Dave.

The team heads to San Diego to visit the Whaley House Museum, a location Dr. Hans Holzer deemed as the most haunted home in America. Their harrowing investigation reveals a dark presence may still be influencing the living in an attempt to fulfill a centuries-old vendetta.

Dave & Alexandra discuss the original case and investigations that led to the Holzer Files team revisiting this extraordinary location.

Visit the Whaley House here: www.WhaleyHouse.com

Visit Alexandra's site here: www.AlexandraHolzer.com
